metadata.title: Backup Camera for Car, 12 LED Night Vision and 170° Wide Angle, Auto Rear View Reverse Camera, Waterproof Shockproof HD Parking Cameras, Universal for Cars, SUV, Van, Trucks, RV
features: 【Reduce Blind Spots】: Our reversing camera is designed with a wide angle 170° large field of view, it can effectively reduce the blind spot of view and avoid unnecessary collisions. The HD lens prevents fogging and you get a clear picture no matter how extreme the weather is. Our cameras detect your surroundings in all directions to protect people or pets around your car.

【12 LED & Night Vision】: 12 high-brightness LEDs can illuminate the road for you in dim light, greatly enhancing the night vision effect. When you back up or park at night, you will find that your surroundings are clearly visible, which greatly enhances your safety when driving at night. You can say goodbye to all kinds of obstacles or collisions when reversing.

【Package Included】: The package includes 1×reverse camera, 1×6m video cable, 1×1m power cable, and 2×screws. We provide you with all the tools you may use. It is very easy to operate and you can choose different installation methods according to your preference.

【Waterproof】: Our cameras are IP68 waterproof, even if they are immersed in water for a long time, they will not be damaged. You don't have to worry about exposure to rain cams or high pressure water guns at car washes, the camera is completely safe. A small reversing camera can help you avoid accidents that may happen, why not?

【Universal Fit】: The rear view camera is compatible with most 12V vehicles and fits perfectly in cars, vehicles, trucks, vans, SUVs, etc. If this product does not meet your expectations, please feel free to contact us, we will try the best to deal with till you satisfied.
